meanings.definition: To win a medal in a competition.
meanings.sent1: She was medalling in the swimming competition.
meanings.sent2: The athlete was medalling in the track and field event.
meanings.sent3: After medalling in the race, she proudly displayed her medal.
meanings.sent4: He kept medalling in various sports, showing his talent.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of medalling for the first time was exhilarating.

meanings.definition: To award or present a medal to someone.
meanings.sent1: The coach was medalling the winners of the tournament.
meanings.sent2: They were medalling the top students at the academic ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The mayor was medalling the local heroes at the community event.
meanings.sent4: The organization was medalling outstanding volunteers for their service.
meanings.sent5: Medalling the champions was a highlight of the event.
